name: spotimeet
description: Meet new people flowing with music

scripts.dev: REDIRECT_HOST=http://127.0.0.1:3000 MONGO_HOST=127.0.0.1 BASE_URL=/ SPTF=$(cat ../secrets/spotify.txt) SPTF_SECRET=$(cat ../secrets/spotify_secret.txt) JWT_SECRET=$(cat ../secrets/hmac.txt) NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0 nodemon index.js
